name: Robot Saga: Diamond feast
description:
NOW 50% OFF limited time offer

Catch all diamonds to finish each level. Look out for angry robots.

Each level requires logic, skill and force to solve.  
This amazing game is equipped with built-in level editor. You can create your own levels and share them among other players, see their highscores and beat them.

This game offers story mode with over 35 built-in levels but that is extended by online levels which other players create.

Game supports: GameCenter, Facebook and Twitter

Facebook fan page:
http://www.facebook.com/SmartRobot

Are you ready for a new challenge?
